alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 05 at 4:57AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Light to Moderate Snow ... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Snow. Accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Wind River Basin and southeast Fremont County including the Green and Rattlesnake ranges. * WHEN...Through 5 PM. * IMPACTS...Roads will become slick and hazardous. Visibility in heavier snow could be down to a quarter mile. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will fall through the day, with daytime highs in the middle to upper teens occurring this morning. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Wind River Basin
